text: The Volcani Institute of Agricultural Research (Hebrew: מכון וולקני) is an agricultural research center named after its founder and director Yitzhak Elazari Volcani. The Institute is located in Rishon LeZion, Israel. == Other websites == *Institute of Agricultural Research website Category:Scientific organizations Category:Colleges and universities in Israel Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Volcani Institute of Agricultural Research
